name: Baby Doll House Cleaning and Decoration - Free Fun Games For Kids, Boys and Girls
name_original: Baby Doll House Cleaning and Decoration - Free Fun Games For Kids, Boys and Girls
description:
Clean and Decorate your doll's house, Make Ice cream for your friends and serve them, Organize all items in your kitchen with great sounds, Clean your lawn with amazing tools and shine your baby doll's house.

Oh yeah you also have got Amazing room of toys to play and organize them so they look beautiful in your doll house.

Key Features:

1. Toy room with huge collection of awesome toys.
2. Lawn to be clean
3. Kitchen to be clean and organize items in kitchen.
4. Amazing Ice cream, Juice, Drinks Shop.

Create, Clean and Decorate the home and enjoy ice cream in shop with Amazing fun tools,

Download today, Enjoy!

Please Rate & Review this game to get us better and creating Amazing games for you,

Thanks
